com.castsoftware.jira.util

Class DatabaseConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.castsoftware.jira.util.DatabaseConnection

  • public class DatabaseConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class DatabaseConnection establishes the database connection depending on the parameters provided in the command line
